title: Reform UK Reveals Another Conservative MP Defection
description: Reform UK has announced the second defection of a sitting lawmaker in a week to its party, as lawmaker Andrew Rosindell joined from the Conservatives.
content: Reform UK has announced the second defection of a sitting lawmaker in a week to its party, as lawmaker Andrew Rosindell joined from the Conservatives.
